content.rendered:
ASSISTANT EVENT
DIRECTOR

Kacey was born and raised in a small suburb in Dayton, Ohio. After high school, she attended the University of Kentucky where she studied hospitality management and tourism with a minor in business. She soon developed an interest in the events and weddings sector of the industry.

Throughout college, Kacey spent time interning with a local event designer and coordinator who specialized in Middle Eastern weddings. She quickly fell in love with the creativity and details of the industry. Kacey joined the Infinity team as an event intern in the summer of 2018 and fell in love with the Nashville events scene. She joined the team full-time as an event specialist at the beginning of 2019.

In her free time, Kacey enjoys spending time with friends, traveling, exploring Nashville, being with her family at their lake house in Michigan, and cheering on the Cats.
